application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of Planning Conditions 8 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities), 9 (Design and Construction of New Access), 10 (Targeted Emmissions Reduction Rate), 12 (Drainage Design), 19 (Buildings, roads, parking areas and pathway levels), 25 (Preliminary Ecological Appraisal/Mitigation Measures), 27 (Arboricultural Method Statement and Tree Protection Plan) and 28 (Landscaping and Planting Scheme) of Planning Permission Ref: 17/10342/FUL (Erection of two new single storey buildings to replace the existing buildings on the site, replacement of the existing 3G sports pitch with a hockey pitch, erection of a new maintenance building and covered maintenance vehicle storage area. Proposed new parking area for 61 cars and 6 mini-buses and new vehicular access road) dated 27/10/2017
